confirm_class_remove: Are you sure to remove this class?
reg_success_msg: Your application has been under review. A reply will be sent to your email box within 2 working days. Please note to check.
class_name_minlength: The minimum character length of title is 3.
email_exist_err: The email address has already existed.
apply_already_err: You have already submitted an application.
old_replay: Replay List of the Old Version
teacher_reg_msg: Currently Live Class is only open to Confucius Institute teachers. If you would like to pass our teacher authentication, please ask your CI to contact us by sending email to liushan@chinesecio.com. Thank you.
create_class_date_msg:
You are recommended to create your class at least a week in advance so that it will be sufficiently publicized and joined.
When a class has started, no editing is allowed any more. Please make sure that the class information has been finished correctly before the class starts.
create_class_file_msg: Before searching, you need to upload your files first. If not necessary, please click "Next".
create_class_student_msg: You can select some students to attend your class if needed. If not, please submit directly. The students who have been selected can enter the class without joining it beforehand.
courseware_upload_msg: Files for uploading need transcoding. You can check the state of the files on“Processing” page.
courseware_format_msg: Only files of the following formats are acceptable. If your PPT includes special characters, please convert it to PDF first.
upload_size_msg: The maximum file size for uploading is 200MB
file_encoding_msg: Transcoding! It will be finished within 24 hours and it will take more time if the file is too large.
browser_msg: Chrome or FireFox browser is recommended.
create_class_tags_msg: This will help students to search
adobe_flash_msg: Adobe Flash Player version 10.0.0 or higher should be installed to view this page.
is_allow_replay: Is replay of this class allowed?
slide_title: Live Class will be formally launched on June 25.
file_img_check: Please ensure that the file is an image.
org_name_exist_err: This name has been already in use.
signup_url_msg: If blank, organization's website will be used by default.
group_name_maxlength: Group name should be no more than 50 characters.
group_exist_tpl: There has already been a group called "{name}".
email_add_member: Or add member by Email address.
maintenance_info: CIO website arranges regular maintenance every Friday 17:30 to 19:30 (Beijing Time). It is hoped that teachers and learners of our website reschedule your teaching and study since your visit to our website will probably be affected during this period. We are sorry for your inconvenience.
upload_statement: Please read "CIO Statement" first. Your uploading is allowed only if you accept the terms of the statement.
ask_admin: If you have questions, please contact the administrator.
invalid_startdate: Your class time should be later than present time.
title_minlength: The minimum character of the title is 3.
title_maxlength: The maximum character of the title is 3.
enter_series_name: Please enter the name of your class series
class_share_info: Share the class 《<%=title %>》of  <%=teacher %>( from professional Chinese learning service platform - <%=CIO %>)
before_maintenance: We start website maintenance at <%=date %> and it will last for <%=hour %> hour(s). Sorry for the inconvenience.
hero_t_content: Live Class provides an interactive platform to teach Chinese for learners across the world!
hero_s_content: Live Class provides an interactive platform to learn Chinese from amazing teachers!
confirm_series_remove: Are you sure to remove the class series?
series_name_minlength: The minimum character length of class series name  is 3
series_close: The class series has been closed
